submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        # drop all nodes between a and b (exclusive at both ends)

        remove_candidate = SortedList(range(n))
        current = n-1
        res = []
        for a, b in queries:
            i = remove_candidate.bisect_left(a)
            j = remove_candidate.bisect_left(b)

            removed = [remove_candidate[t] for t in range(i+1, j)]
            current -= len(removed)
            res.append(current)
            for r in removed:
                remove_candidate.remove(r)
        return res
